book.author: Deitel
book.title: Internet and World Wide Web "How to Program"
book.description: This book is to introduce readers with little or no programming experience to the exciting world of Web-based applications.

book.author: Massimo Banzi OReilly
book.title: Getting Started with Arduino
book.description: This valuable little book offers you lots of ideas for Arduino projects and helps you get going on them right away.
